Level II -  The perks listed under Level I as well as a Team Wyatt T-shirt, to be debuted shortly.
If you are unable to contribute financially, we encourage you to cross-post this across various social media platforms.  We want to raise awareness of childhood cancer and its devastating effect on families.  There are share tools on this site that are conveniently placed for quick and easy distribution.

story:
***If you found your way to this page from Reid Gilbert's obituary, please know that we can no longer accept donations on this page. Please visit http://www.globalgiving.org/projects/support-53-children-in-a-safe-home-oaxaca-mx/ to donate to our cause.***

***Si encontro esa pagina desde el obituario de Reid Gilbert, debe de saber que ya no podemos aceptar donativos aqui. Por favor, visita http://www.globalgiving.org/projects/support-53-children-in-a-safe-home-oaxaca-mx/ para donar.***

For 10 years Casa Hogar Hijos de la Luna, Oaxaca, MX, has given a safe home to children of single mothers who work at night. Many are sex workers. Now Casa Hogar finds themselves with 53 children in a 3 bedroom space. This project is raising funds so that Casa Hogar may purchase the adjoining land to build a new building so they may continue to serve these kids. This cause is urgent. Without more space the older kids must return to homes - sometimes place such as brothels or stripclubs which are completely inappropriate for adolescents. With more space, Casa Hogar could provide these children with safety, education, nutrition, love and support until their independence!

What We Need & What You Get

 

Currently, the owner of the land next door which Casa Hogar would like to purchase is in a hurry to sell. If we can come up with the asking price of $46,478 US before September 15th, she will give us a 20% discount, lowering the price about $9,300 US. We have already spent the past year raising funds, however, $24,000 US is still missing. If we can raise this money within the next month, Casa Hogar will finally be able to purchase this land, expand the project and offer their children a home until their adulthood!

 

If we do not reach our goal, we can keep pushing for the 10% discount the owner of the land has offered us if we raise the funds before October 15. This would save us $4,650 US. If the goal in October is not reached, we will continue to fundraise to the best of our abilities until we are able to pay the full price! As long as no one else offers to purchase the land, that is.

 

The Impact

Casa Hogar, Hijos de la Luna, Oaxaca, Mexico, was founded 9 years ago by Maria de Socorro Ramirez Gonzalez, in response to an endemic crisis she found in her community.  Maria discovered numerous children were being left unattended in their homes through the night because their single mothers worked (many in the sexual service industry) and were unable to care for them.  Maria opened her home at that time to one child.  Now, 10 years later, after much development as a community resource, Maria and her husband find themselves caring for 55 children in three bedrooms.  The children range in age from infancy to 13 years.  They sleep 2-3 to a twin sized bed or crib.  They desperately need to construct more space to continue serving these children.  If they are unable to expand, the older children must return to their homes.  Many of these homes are places where their mothers work which are not healthy environments for their physical or psychological development.

It is impossible to measure the impact of saving a child from an environment inadequate for their healthy development.  The impact is not only for them but also their families and the community in which they live.  By allowing the children to remain at Casa Hogar, they will be assured of a safe environment, adequate nutrition, and education through their high school years.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please make use of the Indiegogo share tools to help us spread the word! Helping Expand Casa Hogar gain an audience is unimaginably valuable. Help allow these children to grow up in a safe, healthy and supportive living environment! Please share our project on Facebook, in emails or by word-of-mouth!

¡La pluma que ofrecemos a nuestros donadores de $20 y $50 y también una caja de 10 cartas Expand Casa Hogar completos con la linda cara de Yael y un mensaje corto explicando tu generosa contribución y el impacto increíble!

story:
Short Summary

"Silicon Beach."  It's a phrase that we in LA are hearing all the time, and we know it's a reference for the explosion of activity in the tech and startup community.  Our team created www.SiliconBeachLA.com to be the one stop site for everything, but we felt that an online resource would only go so far.  We wanted to find a way to take the passion, excitement and energy of the growing community offilne in a BIG way.  

We had a dream for a community branded tour bus to promote the growing LA Tech & Startup community and its companies, as well as take passionate Silicon Beach LA folks to tech events around the US including SXSWi and TechCrunch Disrupt.  This would never be possible unless we hired a bus.  Then out of nowhere a community supporter and our awesome co-founder donated his!!!

So what now?!?!, we can't represent Silicon Beach LA in Texas with any old bus we need a custom wrap design that shows the range of incredible companies and what the LA lifestyle really has to offer.  We want your help/input to smash out a killer community design for the bus as well as perform the necessary maintenance to make sure the party bus will comfortably make it there and back.  

This is for a yearly presence on the bus wrap with an estimated 5M impressions over the course of the year from local exposure & event travel. And this ain't your daddies' old Greyhound, this is a legitimate party bus: 

  • Comfortable seating for 16-18
  • 3 Convertible sofa/bunks (sleeps 6) - 2 standalone sofas (can be sleeper sofas)
  • 2 wet bars w/ 5-bottle rotating dispensers
  • 3-person hot tub
  • B52 Club sound & lighting system
  • On board restroom

***Any overages on the target raise amount ($15K) will go into an operating/travel fund for future events.***

So what now?!?!, we can't represent Silicon Beach LA in Texas with any old bus we need a custom wrap design that shows the range of incredible companies and what the LA lifestyle really has to offer.  We want your help/input to smash out a killer community design for the bus as well as perform the necessary maintenance to make sure the party bus will comfortably make it there and back.  
This is for a yearly presence on the bus wrap with an estimated 5M impressions over the course of the year from local exposure & event travel. And this ain't your daddies' old Greyhound, this is a legitimate party bus: 

Comfortable seating for 16-18
3 Convertible sofa/bunks (sleeps 6) - 2 standalone sofas (can be sleeper sofas)
2 wet bars w/ 5-bottle rotating dispensers
3-person hot tub
B52 Club sound & lighting system
On board restroom

***Any overages on the target raise amount ($15K) will go into an operating/travel fund for future events.***

story:
Memento Studio is a family run Photographic Studio based in Walton on Thames, Surrey, England.

Driven by a passion for photography and filmmaking we used all the capital we had and some we didn’t! and opened our Studio in March 2011.

We wanted to offer local photographers and filmmakers an affordable alternative to the overpriced London studios, which so many of them were forced to use.

Through offering free use of our equipment, keeping our prices low, holding regular affordable workshops and classes we have quickly become a hub for local photographers and creative types and it is this that we want desperately to expand on. Unfortunately we lack the capital we need to really expand, upgrade, (the majority of our equipment was donated and is a little old!) and keep up with what is being requested from us.

Our goal is to raise $4,500 (approx £2,700) to upgrade and expand our existing Photographic Studio. The funds raised would be spread out over a number of necessary items and renovation costs, such as new Studio lighting kit and accessories, installation of a deeper fixed white infinity cove as well as an additional backdrop support system and backdrops. We would also like to upgrade our Kitchen and Lounge areas and install improved toilet facilities.

Not only would these improvements better service the needs of the photographers and filmmakers who already use our studio, but it would also allow us to subsidise workshops and classes for young photographers and filmmakers just starting out.

The campaign, if successful, will help us launch our upgrade process and allow us to purchase new equipment, benefiting everyone that shoots there as well as the next generation of photographers and filmmakers.

We know this won't happen overnight, but it will allow us the chance to take the next step towards what we've been dreaming about and contributing to our community.

Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand if you cannot contribute financially, we could still do with your support though by sharing this campaign with as many of your friends and family as is humanly possible! The more people we can reach, the more we can raise!

Thank you for taking the time to read our campaign and taking an interest in our project. Any and all support is greatly appreciated.

story:
(This pilot project for the city of Philadelphia has been approved by the Philadelphia Department of Human Services and the Child Welfare League of America)

Isn't it Shocking...

Many of the over 600,000 children in foster care in the U.S. face very grim odds:

  • 40% of foster youth are moved 3 or more times, 11% are moved 5 times or more
  • 40% to 50% will never complete high school
  • only 6% of foster youth attend college
  • 65% of foster youth end up homeless (27% of the homeless population spent time in foster care)
  • Over 70% of all state penitentiary inmates have spent time in foster care

Here's the Scoop

Working in a system that's bursting at the seams, caregivers and other foster care stakeholders struggle to meet the needs of these children, and keeping up with the necessary paperwork is practically impossible. As children are moved from placement to placement, their records often become fragmented or are lost. Can you imagine life without your memory boxes, scrapbooks, awards, report cards and health information? Youth in foster care don't have any of this information.

Because they don't have adequate health and education records, they don't get proper medical care and face significant challenges to positive educational experiences. To make matters worse, they often age out of the foster care system feeling no sense of identity and having no foundation to build a future upon.

We are a team of parents from AboutOne.com, a cloud and mobile technology startup that helps people store, manage, and privately share memories and household records (health, education, possessions, career).

We are building a Communication Station to organize and manage the vitally important information needed by children in foster care. 80% of the development is already done because we are modifying the existing AboutOne consumer platform. With your contributions, we can make the necessary modifications so that the system will meet the needs of the children and caregivers in the foster care community.

This short video gives an overview of the existing AboutOne platform that we're building on to create the Communication Station for children in foster care and their caregivers. We need your help. 

How the Communication Station Will Help

The Communication Station is the first application in the world to give children in foster care and their caregivers a private and secure place to quickly and easily manage and privately share the health and education records, memories, and other life documents these vulnerable children need to lead happy, healthy, and productive lives.

 

When these children age out of the foster care system at age 18, their Communication Stations will be turned over to them, ensuring that they will have lifetime access to the vital information they'll need to complete job or college applications and manage their health.

The Communication Station will also play an important part in developing the sense of identity and belonging that comes from having a permanent record of childhood memories and milestones and details about the important people in your life.

How You Can Help

This is a philanthropic project, but we can't do it on our own. We need your help.

You may think the only way you can help is to become a foster parent - something not everyone is equipped or able to do. However, there are different ways to become part of the solution. This is your opportunity to make a difference.

The Communication Station is based on our existing AboutOne consumer platform, so 80% of the work is already done. With your contributions, we can make the necessary modifications so that the system will meet the needs of the children and caregivers in the foster care community.

The Philadelphia Department of Human Services-approved project will launch in December 2012. Phase 1 will go live in June 2013 with 500 children in foster care in the Philadelphia area. The platform will then be released to agencies and other organizations across the U.S. who help children in need.

What You Get

We're offering some great Perks to friends in the Indiegogo community who support our campaign. From "Protect Your Nuts" t-shirts to our "Organization Station" bags, we've got you covered!

The Impact

100% of the money we raise will go toward the development of feature enhancements to our existing platform that are necessary to support children in foster care. Your contribution will help us make this platform available to agencies and other organizations across the country that help children in need.

Thank You + Ways to Get Involved

We are grateful for any support you can offer. Giving at any level sends the message that you care about improving the lives of children in foster care.

Please help us spread our message online and offline to your friends and family. Indiegogo's helpful share tools make it easy to create a ripple effect with your gift. 

Another way to give back or contribute is to volunteer and mentor with organizations like Camp to Belong, OPPORTUNITIES-PA, or Foster Care Alumni Association (watch their video for more information!)

Thank you!

Thank you!
campaign_city: Philadelphia, Salt Lake City, United States

story:
Chess & Community Counseling

Chess & Community Counseling (CCC) empowers students between the ages of 8 and 17 with critical thinking techniques that can be utilized and applied to their daily lives. Our individual and group workshops implement our motto, Think before you Move, to encourage students to evaluate their circumstances and plan steps to overcome them. CCC uses chess as a therapeutic model, and creative expression as a tool for empowering youth. 

The goal of this campaign is to bring "Classic City Knights," a youth chess team from Athens, Georgia, to compete at the annual Bum Rush the Board chess tournament in Washington, D.C. (www.wblinc.org/bumrush/). Many of the students have never journeyed outside of their towns or the state of Georgia. This annual trip to Washington, D.C., will be a life changing, eye opening and educational experience for them.  Not only will they compete in the chess tournament, but they will also get an opportunity to tour the Nation’s Capital and learn how policies drawn from the White House trickle down to affect their local communities. Many will learn that the world is bigger than their crime-ridden neighborhoods, and will get the opportunity to meet other youth from around the country to share in solutions for empowerment. 

 

 

On April 12 -14, 2013, we will bring 15-20 middle and high school students from Athens, Georgia, to Washington, D.C., for an annual chess tournament and touring of the Nation’s Capital.  The students will be chaperoned by three adolescent development mentors. Your support will cover the following:

  • Round-trip transportation rental for students and chaperones  
  • Fuel costs (approximately 1,250 miles) and insurance
  • Experienced driver
  • Chaperone stipend for 72 hour supervision
  • Tournament fees
  • Hotel and food costs
  • Team uniforms and journals
  • Washington, D.C., Tour Guide

The students will keep a journal to document their experiences throughout the trip. They will compare and contrast their local community/neighborhoods with that of Washington, D.C. Students will also write an essay expressing how this experience changed or shaped their view of self and the United States.  

If we are unable to reach our maximum goal, we will reduce the number of students that we can bring on this trip and limit other spending costs. The vision of the trip is determined by what we are able to raise.  We have already begun local campaigning in hopes of covering expenses not mentioned in the budget.    

The Impact

We at CCC are extremely proud of our students. They have and continue to overcome many obstacles placed before them.  Despite the difficulties they face daily, many of them maintain a positive outlook and attitude on life.  For some, chess has become the model for planning their lives, and for others, playing chess helps them escape the cycle of poverty they are attempting to break. It is way too easy for them to slip into the hardships of street life, and we’ve managed to keep them focused on their personal goals and engage them through various community projects/programs and events such as this annual trip to Washington, D.C. 

Students are also impacted with visits to college campuses and parks to play chess with the homeless and learn valuable lessons about life. The overall mission is to prepare them and remind them that they too have a role in positively impacting this society. Chess is the vehicle used to transport and translate this message.

 Thank you for your support.

 

Director and Founder Lemuel LaRoche, MSW, earned his degree from the University of Georgia. LaRoche has over 15 years of experience in child and community development. He serves as a mentor, chess instructor and life coach for many teens in communities across Northeast Georgia.

story:
What is Shower Curtain Bling ?

Shower Curtain Bling is a removable, re-usable decorative accent for your shower curtain. Shower Curtain Bling is easy to install and attaches directly to your existing shower curtain rings.

Question? 

How many of your friends and family members visit your restroom while in your home?   The bathroom is often the forgotten room in the house, yet it can say a lot about a person. Wow your friends and family by having a one of a kind item that will immediately bring a hint of class and style to your bathroom.

Where Can I Find Shower Curtain Bling?

Shower Curtain Bling is sold locally as well as from coast to coast via the Etsy marketplace.  http://www.etsy.com/shop/ShowerCurtainBling?ref=si_shop.

On Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/ShowerCurtainBling?ref=hl

Our goal:

The goal of this project is to be able to efficiently meet our growing demand while expanding our product line and evaluating our marketing strategies. With your help, we will be able to bring Shower Curtain Bling to a much larger market.

We are still in the early stages of our project,

yet there has been an outpouring of interest. We now must grow more rapidly than we initially anticipated. Continuing our product development and testing, streamlining our packaging, developing professional photographs and marketing Shower Curtain Bling to a wider customer base is where your contributions will prove invaluable.

Our ultimate goal is to have Shower Curtain Bling available in every Bath and Beauty section of every department store in the country. Our goals are lofty, but with your help, we will make this a reality.

 

How can you help?

Pledging all that you can will take us farther into obtaining our goals faster, and at this point, there is no time to waste!  We know we are being conservative in the financial goals of this campaign, but if we exceed our campaign goals, your funds will help take us from our product's concept and development stages all the way to our market launch, and we want you with us all the way!

 

What else can you do?

We want you to help us market our Indiegogo campain.  Be part of the birth and growth of Shower Curtain Bling and when she comes to your local shopping center you can say, " I helped ".  We can not do it without you! 

*  Post a link to our Indiegogo campaign daily on your Facebook, Twitter and other social networking sites.  Talk us up.

* Re-post our YouTube video on your Facebook page and social networking sites.

* Like us on Facebook.  https://www.facebook.com/ShowerCurtainBling

*  Spread the word at work, and with your family and friends.  Physically give them or e-mail them a link to our campaign.

*  Go crazy and use your imagination,  print flyers, post to your blog, pin a link to our campain to your Pinterest.  Just please, do not spam or illigally solicit.

* Parcipate in some of our marketing surveys when we post them.

* Send us your referrals and pledge.

        *Any pledge amount will be automatically entered to win this full length Shower Curtain Bling.   Receive extra entries by referring  additional pledges. Drawing will be held June 1st.

 (Be sure your referrals submit your name under comments when they pledge to receive one entry for their pledge.)  They will recieve one entry and you will receive one entry.

Entrants can only use each referral name once.

Must be 18 years of age to enter.

USA shipping included, international winner will be responsible for shipping charges.

 

Where will your funds go?

500.00       Materials for further product development

1,000.00    Professional Market Research

 

FUN FACT: 

Shower Curtain Bling was invented with a "splash." I'm the kind of person who is constantly thinking of new ideas and designs. Whenever I get a free moment, my mind takes me away to imagine all the possible things left to create. One such moment -- I'm not embarrassed to say now, since it gave birth to Shower Curtain Bling -- happened on my way to visit the "privy" (classy way of saying toilet).

I was trying to decide what I could do with a few beaded fringe strands I had remaining from a lamp I had just finished designing. I brought the strands with me on my visit to see "Lou" and just as I lifted his lid, a twinkle struck my eye. I was suddenly taken aback by how much the florescent light glistened off of the breaded fringe. I held the beads up higher, until the background came into focus and I noticed how good they looked set against my shower curtain. 

When inspiration strikes, you just have to go with it,  so I stood on the side of my tub to see how I could attach them. But my clumsy nature won out again, as I lost my balance and started careening towards the floor. I grabbed onto my shower curtain for support, but it quickly gave way as unforgiving gravity sent me and the shower curtain heading straight down. I pushed my foot out to brace the fall, but the toilet seat was already opened, so all five of my piggies went for a swim. 

My husband walked in after hearing the commotion, only to discover me standing there holding a curtain rod in one hand while my right leg rested ankle-deep in the toilet-bowl. 

"I'm not sure you're doing that right," is all he said to me. 

One broken shower curtain rod and a damp foot later, and Shower Curtain Bling was born. 

 

Just a sample of our Hand Crafted Shower Curtain Bling:

Additional product designs currently in development:

Shower Curtain Blings with interchangeable themed Bling Charms, so you can accessorize your bath according to season or desired theme.

We clip right on to your Shower Curtain Bling.

Bling Charm themes could include:

Holidays such as:   Christmas: Santas, Candy canes, Christmas stockings or Christmas trees. Easter: Bunnies, Ducks and Easter eggs.  Forth of July: Stars or Fireworks.   

Seasonal: Spring or Fall leaves, Flowers or Snowflakes. 

Elegance:  Cameos, Diamonds or Gold coins.

Children's Bling:  Ducks, Stars, Teddy Bears, Butterflies, Balloons, Cars, Boats and more.                

Shower Door, Mirror Blings and Curtain Blings are also in the product development stages.....  

                                               Bling Charms

Interchangeable Charms Shower Curtain Bling Straight Strands, shown with Flower Charms

Interchangeable Charms Shower Curtain Bling Straight Strands

Interchangeable Charms Shower Curtain Bling Arched

Interchangeable Charms Shower Curtain Bling Staggered Strands

 

Your Rewards:

We are so committed to the success of Shower Curtain Bling that in addition to our Awesome Bling,  we are offering some very special rewards from Suzanne Michelle Illuminations.  The Illuminated Art Pieces shown here are one of a kind, numbered and dated.

USA shipping charges are included for all pledges except for lamps,  all other countries must pay separate shipping charges for all pledges before your pledge is shipped.

If you see a reward you are interested in on this list that is not listed for purchase in our right column , please contact us and we will list it for you to purchase. 

Note:  PayPal pledges may be shipped earlier than estimated.

 

 

 

 

 

Our History

Shadez of Michelle and Suzanne Michelle Illuminations since 1990. http://shadezofmichelle.com/

 

In conclusion:

Unlike other products or businesses, interest is not a challenge for Shower Curtain Bling. Oddly enough, our biggest challenge is meeting our ever-growing demand -- which is a very good problem to have. Every single order has been filled and delivered on time, however, being able to manufacture our product more quickly would allow us the ability to expand to where we would like to be.

This is a large and time consuming project, and we have gone farther than we had expected within such a short period of time, but Shower Curtain Bling needs your help to meet our goals. The funding we hope to receive, from contributors like you, will ensure that we can manufacture the product on a wider scale and sell it at the most reasonable price possible.

I held the beads up higher, until the background came into focus and I noticed how good they looked set against my shower curtain. 
When inspiration strikes, you just have to go with it,  so I stood on the side of my tub to see how I could attach them. But my clumsy nature won out again, as I lost my balance and started careening towards the floor. I grabbed onto my shower curtain for support, but it quickly gave way as unforgiving gravity sent me and the shower curtain heading straight down. I pushed my foot out to brace the fall, but the toilet seat was already opened, so all five of my piggies went for a swim. 
My husband walked in after hearing the commotion, only to discover me standing there holding a curtain rod in one hand while my right leg rested ankle-deep in the toilet-bowl. 
"I'm not sure you're doing that right," is all he said to me. 
One broken shower curtain rod and a damp foot later, and Shower Curtain Bling was born. 
 
Just a sample of our Hand Crafted Shower Curtain Bling:

Additional product designs currently in development:
 Shower Curtain Blings with interchangeable themed Bling Charms, so you can accessorize your bath according to season or desired theme.

We clip right on to your Shower Curtain Bling.
Bling Charm themes could include:
Holidays such as:   Christmas: Santas, Candy canes, Christmas stockings or Christmas trees. Easter: Bunnies, Ducks and Easter eggs.  Forth of July: Stars or Fireworks.   
Seasonal: Spring or Fall leaves, Flowers or Snowflakes. 
Elegance:  Cameos, Diamonds or Gold coins.
Children's Bling:  Ducks, Stars, Teddy Bears, Butterflies, Balloons, Cars, Boats and more.                
Shower Door, Mirror Blings and Curtain Blings are also in the product development stages.....  
                                               Bling Charms







Interchangeable Charms Shower Curtain Bling Straight Strands, shown with Flower Charms

Interchangeable Charms Shower Curtain Bling Straight Strands

Interchangeable Charms Shower Curtain Bling Arched

Interchangeable Charms Shower Curtain Bling Staggered Strands
 
Your Rewards: 
We are so committed to the success of Shower Curtain Bling that in addition to our Awesome Bling,  we are offering some very special rewards from Suzanne Michelle Illuminations.  The Illuminated Art Pieces shown here are one of a kind, numbered and dated.
USA shipping charges are included for all pledges except for lamps,  all other countries must pay separate shipping charges for all pledges before your pledge is shipped.
If you see a reward you are interested in on this list that is not listed for purchase in our right column , please contact us and we will list it for you to purchase.  
Note:  PayPal pledges may be shipped earlier than estimated.
 

 
 
 
 
Our History
Shadez of Michelle and Suzanne Michelle Illuminations since 1990. http://shadezofmichelle.com/



 
In conclusion:
Unlike other products or businesses, interest is not a challenge for Shower Curtain Bling. Oddly enough, our biggest challenge is meeting our ever-growing demand -- which is a very good problem to have. Every single order has been filled and delivered on time, however, being able to manufacture our product more quickly would allow us the ability to expand to where we would like to be.
This is a large and time consuming project, and we have gone farther than we had expected within such a short period of time, but Shower Curtain Bling needs your help to meet our goals. The funding we hope to receive, from contributors like you, will ensure that we can manufacture the product on a wider scale and sell it at the most reasonable price possible.

story:
Do you remember when watching a movie together was fun? Do you remember a service with an abundant number of movies that you could choose from and still wouldn't be ripped off? Do you remember when businesses would be passionate about movies so they would bend over backwards to make you walk in their door to get your business? We sure do…but that was a LONG time ago.

My name is Talib Habib. I am 19 Years old and I am full-time college student. Born in Pakistan but raised in Sacramento, California. I quickly picked up the English language and the American culture after moving to America when I was 7 years old. I am still being educated in America, I have made friends here, I have gotten all my opportunities here, and I will have my success here.

After getting my first computer in the summer of 2008, I became addicted to entertainment. It opened up another medium for me to learn from. I quickly grew into becoming a visual learner and could retain information much faster. That love of entertainment grew every year and so did my knowledge. When I needed more content to watch, I was at a dead end. There was no service out there that could cater to a person like me who was in love with entertainment. In the spring of 2011, I couldn’t find a legitimate service, so I asked my best friend Chris to see if he wanted to start one. And here we are…

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My name is Christopher Todorvitch. I am also 19 years old and attending college. I was born and raised Sacramento, California. I have been an entertainment fanatic since I was young. My specialty was in music and my stage name was ‘YC’ or ‘Young Chris’.  I am at a point in my life that has made me realize and understand that if I apply myself, I can go even further. I am not using my potential at a maximum level and I need to keep pushing for greatness.

I really got interested in movies in spring of 2010 after I kept watching marathons of movies and documentaries. My father works in the movie industry and it’s partly because of him that I became so interested. I started to get involved in learning behind the camera. I enjoyed audio engineering the most because it’s related to my first love: music. As 2011 and 2012 progressed, and the economy fluctuated, we started making strides to jumpstart our company. Due to our crazy school and work schedules, the development of MyCineWeb was always starting and stopping. But finally as things are coming together, we’re starting…and both of us are very excited.

MyCineWeb is an Online Instant Movie Streaming Service. It’s similar to Netflix in that it provides the same service of online streaming, but different that it’s being developed for people by people who are passionately into movies. This service will also be for occasional movie watchers as it provides a much better and a bigger library than its forebears. As a customer who quit Netflix, it irritated us that we couldn’t find anything that we wanted to watch. Most of my time (90%) would be used to find something interesting to watch and the rest (10%) actually watching it. Many iconic movies that have revolutionized the world aren’t available to watch on Netflix Instant, but mediocre to sub-par ones are. We know it’s not nice to belittle a company that revolutionized the industry, but we really believe that the time has come to have a new and a fresh vision to the industry.

We, Chris and Talib, are two people who are amazed, and addicted to movies. We know what it feels like to be the recipient of an online movie service because we know the pain of not having a great service for movies. But it’s not just the content that irritates us; it’s also how they treat their customers and try to take advantage of them. It is the universal goal of any business to make profits but is it fair to the customers that they are being milked of every hard-earned dollar?  To us, that doesn’t sound right nor fair in which a company earns respect.

One of the core foundations of MyCineWeb is to not just provide good content but also provide great and amazing customer service. In any facet of life, it is hard to  gain and regain respect. This is especially true in business because the customer might end up switching to another company, or quit using the service altogether. Do you remember Qwikster from Netflix in 2011 that made around 800,000 subscribers quit? Netflix is known for its price increases but it doesn’t necessarily offer too much in return for the customer. We are not trying to reinvent the wheel; we are just making it better.

Bottom Line: We, Chris and Talib, are two individuals who are passionate about movies and entertainment that are developing an Online Instant Movie Streaming Service called MyCineWeb which will offer better content and great customer service than its forebears.

We have completed many of the preliminary tasks to get it up and running:

  • Registered under Sacramento County to get our DBA
  • Got a Logo
  • Registered under the USPTO for the trademark
  • Hired and almost paid off Website Designer
  • Developed the Pages of the FINAL website
  • Made the Fundraising Campaign
  • Bought the domain
  • Created the Landing Page

Things we need to do:

  • Need to test the FINAL website on servers
  • Maintain Indiegogo Campaign
  • Acquire movies simultaneously running the fundraising Campaign
  • Then, it’s SHOWTIME!!!!!!!

Our donation goal is $27,000. This is a good, solid amount to get us started. We need to finish paying off our website designer who has done a fantastic job in developing our website. The only thing left on the final website are the final testing on the servers, and the final changes. Then we will be ready to add movies. This money will also help us pay the enormous bills that will come soon for good servers to get amazing speed. We do not want to compromise quality of the service. Other than our website designer and paying the bills on the servers, we need a small portion to help us pay for lodging and gas when we go out to get more movies. This money won’t go to our personal funds, so it will help us increase more content towards the website.

As we progress and when the site picks up, we are going to need far more than $27,000 to run it. So even though we need $27,000 right now, feel more than free to keep on donating, as there are no caps to our perks.

Our perks are very interesting. We wanted to have perks that were very intimate to the project. In every perk, you will get some form of a letter or a human connection to let you know that you too, are part of the service. As the donation amount rises, you can get things like couple of T-shirts, stickers and also choose in what medium you want your human connection to be in. If you are an established/upcoming new business who wants to have your logo on our FRONT PAGE of the website, then there is a perk for that. If you want us to come to you and spend one whole day with you, there is a perk for that. Because you are being so generous, we want to make sure that you are happy with every single donation you make.

With some of the larger donations, we are going to need some of your information. Do not get scared, because you are essentially signing up for a decent sized package to come to your house.

If you do not like what you are receiving for a certain amount of donation and would like something else, or you have any questions about where the money goes or a question about a certain reward, then feel free to email us at: maininformation@mycineweb.com.

How many times have you heard, “There is nothing good to watch on Netflix? How come they can’t add more content? Where are the good movies?” Over and over again, we have heard this sentiment and that it why we are starting up MyCineWeb. Over time, services that offer movies and TV-shows online will be replacing companies like Dish Network and DirecTV. People are dropping their TV subscriptions as a whole and switching over to service like Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Hulu to watch their shows and favorite movies. One day, our goal is to be the premier service that people switch to and utilize. 

Services like Netflix and Amazon allow you to control what you want to watch, and pay a better rate than services like Dish and DirecTV. So we ask you, why not develop a service that caters to all our needs? Why not support people who want to change the way we watch movies? Why not support people who are passionate about movies because they will care more about the service, and not care about making a quick profit? Lastly, we ask you one last time, “Why not donate to MyCineWeb?”

There are many ways you can help us reach our goal. Since it’s a combined effort to make this service become a reality, we need your opinion and input on how you would like the service as well. In a perfect world, how can we serve you better?

The biggest way to support us right now is to donate money as well as donate your opinion to us. If you know someone who will like the idea of creating an Online Instant Movie Streaming Service, why don’t you share it with him or her?


Another way to support us is to:

  1. Like Our Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/MyCineWeb/422436507774174
  2. Visit Our Landing Page: http://www.mycineweb.com
  3. On Our Landing Page, Enter in your email to stay updated!

If You have any questions, feel free to email us at: maininformation@mycineweb.com

We are aiming to launch in the end of 2013! With your help, we can get there together!

So Let's Watch Entertainment Together. My Movies, My Way, MyCineWeb!

story:
Our Goals

  • Promote vaping as a safer alternative to smoking
  • Get as many people to try vaping as we can reach
  • Get the word out on studies done that show vaping is safer than smoking
  • Serve our local public with a brick and mortar store
  • Support our community of vapers world wide with a web site  

Another very important goal for us, is to educate every smoker on this amazing new tool to quit smoking.  We want to educate the non-smokers who believe vaping is smoking, who believe vaping is somehow a tobacco product.  We will support all local call to actions when local governments try to ban vaping.  We want to expand the vaping community until EVERYONE who WANTS to quit knows about VAPEing !! 

We NEED to debunk the vaping myths, and naysayers.  Using our Facebook page we post LEGITIMATE studies about vaping and stay involved with our local vaping community !!

Our Store

Not only a place where you can stop in and try any of our 200 flavors (and growing) of e-juice, see the very best equipment for beginners to the connoisseur, but also learn about Vaping on every level.

We are also very active advocates in the "anti-ecig" campaigns going on in the country and locally.  Help us be more vocal and stop the absurd notion that an ecig is a tobacco product !! 


Quit Smoking Using a Vaporizer

Smoking sucks.  It really is a disgusting habit, and EVERY SMOKER KNOWS IT.  So why not just quit ? 

Why deal with that awful smell on your clothes and hair, and ash trays and thick yellow residue on the windows of your car and the walls in your home ?

Why offend EVERYONE around you and cause them harm ?

Why keep spending your hard earned money on something that will eventually KILL You ??

Do you know there are 4000 chemicals in a traditional cigarette ?  

69 of which are KNOWN to cause cancer !  

Vapers report saving between $75 & $200 per month !


"Quitting is a process, not an event" --  

A quote from one of my doctors that lead me to Vaporizing.

I'm not trying to re-invent the wheel here.  I don't have some super space aged tech on the brink of reality..  I'm just a construction worker from the suburbs of Chicago with a message.  If I can quit smoking, if my wife can quit smoking, if my adult son can quit smoking using this idea, then anyone can quit... And EVERYONE NEEDS TO KNOW ABOUT THIS !!

Most Existing Vape stores have shelves full of different style vaporizers, cartimizers, atomizers, batteries, mods...  things the BEGINNER knows nothing about !!

What I am proposing is a one stop shop, not just for the essentials you need to stop smoking, but to get KNOWLEDGE and up to date information on what state regulators and the FDA are saying, as well as what leading doctors have to say about this growing trend !


Monetary Breakdown from donations

My beautiful wife an I are both from customer service backgrounds and look forward to serving you and keeping you informed, and reaching out to everyone within our reach.  With your help, we can stretch that reach a lot further.


PERKS

  • We have compiled a list of Perks that we think will give you an excellent opportunity to help us out while we get started and help you out too !!   Do you think the perks need some tweaking ?  NO PROBLEM, let us know what you want to see and what we can do to make this campaign even better !
  • EVEN if our campaign is not a smashing success we will still be pushing forward with our plan !!  EVERYONE needs to know about Vaping, and I have made it my mission to see that everyone does...  in my community and everywhere !


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Just because you can't contribute a monetary amount, doesn't mean you can't help!  YOU CAN !!  Please share this with all of your friends, whether they are smokers or not !  Chances are they have a loved one who is and needs to quit !
  • You can Share on Facebook, Twitter, by word of mouth !!  Tell your neighbors, tell your friends, tell FOX NEWS !!  (just kidding).  PLEASE help me spread the word!

We invite you to be part of our story !!

Every contributor will be recognized on a special "founders page" of our website !!  No matter what size donation !!

Our Back Story

This is how I started writing our campaign, it seemed a bit too personal, but it just came out when I was trying to get across the passion I have for vaping, and why.

     My name is David, and I lost my father, Bob, to lung cancer in 2007, one month after his 56th birthday.  My dad was a hard working, good guy that everyone liked.  He was quiet and reserved, smart and wise... he was also a smoker.  He was Born in the 50's, and growing up, smokers were cool.  I remember seeing pictures of him with a cigarette pack rolled up in the sleeve of his white T-shirt with his Fonze-style hair cut.  But years later, after fighting with everything he had for 18 months, he lost his battle with cancer.  It was horrible to watch this strong, proud man, my Dad, fight with everything he had to stay with us... His wife of 35 years, his 2 boys and our wives and his 5 grand children who he would never see grow up... or even get to see 2 of them to their 4th Birthday.

My dad told me about a week before he passed, "you should quit... you don't want this". He was right, I didn't want that.  It was terrible and it was hard, and I KNEW better.  

5 years later, I was still smoking up to a pack a day, After watching cancer slowly kill my dad, after watching my mother-in-law deal with emphysema and passing away at 54. Dealing with all the ashtrays and horrible smell, after trying the gum and the patches and trying to quit cold turkey, even after taking prescription anti-depressants designed to help you quit... I had my first heart attack.  My doctors told me to quit.  "It causes heart disease, and cancer..."  everything I already knew.  

Shortly after that I was introduced to something that actually worked for me... It helped me stop smoking, it helped me stop the second hand smoke, and the smell and the yellow walls in my home and I want to share it with everyone who still smokes !!

Thank-You for reading and taking part in our incredible journey.  Your help means the world to us--

Just because you can't contribute a monetary amount, doesn't mean you can't help!  YOU CAN !!  Please share this with all of your friends, whether they are smokers or not !  Chances are they have a loved one who is and needs to quit !

You can Share on Facebook, Twitter, by word of mouth !!  Tell your neighbors, tell your friends, tell FOX NEWS !!  (just kidding).  PLEASE help me spread the word!

We invite you to be part of our story !!Every contributor will be recognized on a special "founders page" of our website !!  No matter what size donation !!Our Back StoryThis is how I started writing our campaign, it seemed a bit too personal, but it just came out when I was trying to get across the passion I have for vaping, and why.     My
name is David, and I lost my father, Bob, to lung cancer in 2007, one
month after his 56th birthday.  My dad was a hard working, good guy that
everyone liked.  He was quiet and reserved, smart and wise... he was also
a smoker.  He was Born in the 50's, and growing up, smokers were cool.
 I remember seeing pictures of him with a cigarette pack rolled up in the
sleeve of his white T-shirt with his Fonze-style hair cut.  But years
later, after fighting with everything he had for 18 months, he lost his battle
with cancer.  It was horrible to watch this strong, proud man, my
Dad, fight with everything he had to stay with us... His wife of 35 years, his
2 boys and our wives and his 5 grand children who he would never see grow up...
or even get to see 2 of them to their 4th Birthday.
My dad told me about a
week before he passed, "you should quit... you don't want this". He was right, I didn't want that.  It was terrible and it was hard,
and I KNEW better.  
5
years later, I was still smoking up to a pack a day, After watching cancer
slowly kill my dad, after watching my mother-in-law deal with emphysema and passing away at 54. Dealing with all the ashtrays and horrible smell, after trying the gum and the patches and trying to quit cold turkey, even after
taking prescription anti-depressants designed to help you quit... I had my
first heart attack.  My doctors told me to quit.  "It causes heart disease, and
cancer..."  everything I already knew.  
Shortly after that I was introduced to something that actually worked for
me... It helped me stop smoking, it helped me stop the second hand smoke, and
the smell and the yellow walls in my home and I want to share it with everyone who still smokes !!Thank-You for reading and taking part in our incredible journey.  Your help means the world to us--

Higa-onon Ha Migsabuwa Ta Lanao, Inc.- is an Indigenous Led Non Government Organization based in Philippines. The Organization is affiliated with different organization in Philippines to respond the needs of the people and most of all in this time of sorrows and depression.

As of this moment due to the devastation left by the deadly Typhoon Yolanda (Haiyan) that claimed hundreds of lives and thousands of people suffered hunger that bring them also to death. The real situation of the victims of the typhoon yolanda are very bad to affects their survival. No foods, No Clothing, No Shelter at all. Their properties were swept away and nothing left at all. It is a worst of that devastated all lives and Properties.

We are humbly to make an appeal and knocking your hearts and mercy to help the needy victims of the Typhoon Yolanda, their hearts are seeking support and help from you that could lead them to survive. This campaign is very significant to let the victims of the typhoon live.

We are calling to your compassion, that if you could share and donate your support for only one time to feed the hungry victims of the Typhoon that could be appreciated. As one family in this world please accept us one of your extended families who are destroyed and this time of needs and sorrows may we ask your presence. Your Contributions to this calamity will help a lot to address their needs. PLEASE HELP US NOW.

Your Contributions will be used to buy a relief goods( rice, can goods, noodles, clothing, mats, shelter) materials to respond their needs.

They really need help as of this moment, and the only answer your help. Please hear hearts and follow your mercy for the helping hands unto us.

And We are happy if you could share this campaign to your friends of friends so that they will be aware also about this campaign. PLEASE HELP US TO SAVE THE LIVES OF THE VICTIMS.

story:
The VEGA | Skincare Studio Concept

Results-oriented, high-tech, animal-friendly skin care and waxing.

That's my idea, in a nutshell.

I have been a Licensed Esthetician for seven years, and a vegetarian for the better part of the last ten years. As an animal lover, I am passionate about protecting the rights of our furry, scaly, and feathery friends. As a skin care specialist, I am committed to effective, results-driven products and treatments. Far too often, I see brands that sacrifice one value for the other; effective but with questionable ingredients, healthy but don't deliver on their promises. Why can't you have both?

My goal is to create a space where the veggie and conscious client can feel confident that the products used will help them achieve optimal skin health (and beauty, of course) using only animal-free, ethically created products.

What We Need & What You Get

My original goal for this project was $10,000, which is what you see over to the right. This amount will help to cover the start up costs, which include securing a location for the business, getting the required permits and licenses, furnishing and equipping the space, establishing a web presence, and the making the opening orders for products and supplies. Opening a business is expensive, even more so when the origin and quality of these products and supplies are of the utmost importance!


Check out my vision board on Pinterest to see how your contribution helps

Every single little dollar counts in helping meet this goal, and even if the goal is not fully met, will help to cover the essentials, such as insurance, equipment, products and supplies. If I reach my big goal ($10k), VEGA Skincare Studio will be open full time, in a beautiful new community of salon studios in San Francisco's Russian Hill. If the goal is not met, I will do everything I can to still open for business, although the location and hours will be a little more up in the air.

The current perks available include major online gratitude (Twitter, Tumblr, Facebook, and the future VEGA Skincare Studio website) for smaller donations, hand crafted vegan soy candles with custom aromatherapy blends, and (for the big spenders) VIP discounts on products and services. Once I hit $5k, the perks will get even better, so let's make that happen!


The Impact

 I believe that skin care should be both results-oriented and cruelty-free, and VEGA Skincare Studio will provide a space where veggie and conscious clients can feel confident that their skin care goals will be met in a relaxing environment using products that are not tested on animals, and that do not contain any animal ingredients. We need to show the cosmetics industry that there is a demand for safe, effective, and cruelty-free products in order to move the industry in the right direction!


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Share this IndieGoGo campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, your blog, and anywhere else you think people would be interested in seeing it. Tell all your friends (especially the veggies) that SF's new, vegan skincare studio needs their help!

story:
Short Summary

Hi my name is Jon Mercer, just an ordinary guy who's trying to help a good friend after a life changing accident. I want to try and raise at least £500.00 for him by growing a moustache as part of Movember.

 

On March 3rd 2013, while taking part in his local Eden Valley sportive, Michael Bonney fell off his bike, just like we all do. Only this time, instead of jumping up and laughing it off, Michael suffered a life changing injury. Attended to by doctors at the scene of the accident, he was then flown by air ambulance to a specialist unit where he was diagnosed with a severed spinal cord at the C3 vertebrae. The result is that Michael is now tetraplegic - paralysed from the neck down, requiring a ventilator to breath.

What We Need & What You Get

Michael will need 24/7 medical attention for the rest of his life.

  • A full time carer will be by his side for the rest of his life.
  • The anticipated costs to help him are in the region of £100K per year!
  • The money I hope to raise will go directly to him to assist with any medical expenses, assistive technology, anything to make his life easier than it is currently.

 

The Impact

The brutal reality of the situation is that Michael will require a full-time carer, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. His home will need to have the necessary remodelling undertaken to accommodate his condition and meet his accessibility needs. He will need a wheel-chair accessible vehicle to help give him a level of independence which we know he thrives on. Any money I can raise will go some way into make this easier.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please visit the ride for Michael site - http://rideformichael.org/ for other ways you can help.

 

Thanks

 

Jon

story:
Shine Kindred Society is a non-profit society created to remove barriers that hinder the lives of children in our community. We create healthy and inspiring environments through renovation and revitalization of existing bedrooms.


Shine is incorporated under the Society Act of BC (S-58175) and has been since April 2011. We currently have a volunteer board of directors and we have helped 14 children as of March 2014. We wish to expand our capabilities and work with many more families as the need is great. We are prepared to take our society to the next level and become a full fledged charity. All funds raised here will go towards our charitable status application process and fund 6 more bedroom reFRESHments for deserving children.

Your generous support is greatly appreciated.  

reFRESH a room, inspire a child

Funds are just one way you can help us. You can also help spread the word and let families know we are here to help. Check out our webpage, like us on Facebook, and share us right here on Indiegogo.

Let's inspire the next generation together.

story:
Short Summary

The Grease Pit is a collective volunteer-run bike shop that teaches bike building, maintenance, and repair in order to promote self-sufficiency, free mobility, and a mode of transportation that does not require fossil fuel.

We provide tools, stands, used parts, advice, and bikes – from fully built to just bare frames.  You provide the rest.

We are a community workspace, not a professional service shop; we will not fix your bike for you, but we will teach you to do it yourself.

What We Need & What You Get

We pay about $650 on average for rent and utilities per month, which we pay through fundraisers, as well as monetary donations for bikes, bike parts, and use of the shop. 

Winter is a pretty dead season--so we're paying rent but making very little money.

The money we get through this fundraiser will go towards paying rent, new tools, and making the shop space more usable. 

We will also use the money towards producing an awesome Grease Pit calendar, as well as other fundraising merchandise.

The Impact

  • Funding the Grease Pit will allow us security of space in the Phillips Neighborhood. We help so many kids who can only pay in work-trade, but we also need money to pay rent. 
  • You will get some cool schwag and maybe some high fives.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • COME VOLUNTEER WITH US!!! Winter Hours are 3-9 Tues & Thurs, 12-6 Sat-Sun.
  • We need firewood.
  • We need as many high fives as possible.
  • Share this fundraising campaign!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Summary

Our team consists of 7 keen and enthusiastic students from across NUI Galway’s engineering disciplines with the full backing of the engineering teaching staff.

Inspired by an eco-friendly future for transport, the Shell Eco-Marathon challenges students across the world to design, build and race ultra-efficient vehicles. We will be racing in Rotterdam 2015, in the prototype electric car class.

Any contribution small or large will move us one step closer to our goal of creating Ireland's most fuel efficient car. With just over a year to race day, contributions will enable us to build a chassis that we can then test and continually improve. 

For more information on the Shell Eco-Marathon click here

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently in the design phase our project, and we need funding to push our project out of the design phase and into the garage.

If you decide to contribute your, money will be going towards:

  •   Steel for the chassis and steering systems
  •   Wheels and tires
  •   Motor
  •   Battery

Once we have these things we can build, test and improve, pushing ourselves to achieve greatness. 

The Impact

The Shell Eco-Marathon serves as a platform for innovation, by putting young engineers head to head, to explore and develop new ideas to make vehicles more fuel efficient. By contributing to our project you will be helping seven young engineers achieving there dream to create an ultra fuel efficient car.

Thanks for taking the time to learn about our project we are happy to answer any questions on our facebook page www.facebook.com/NUIGEcoMarathon , don’t forget to like us!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute that's ok just share this page on facebook.
